Events that occurred on 25 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1903 - J.R.R. Tolkien takes his First Communion.
1914 – The last meeting of the T.C.B.S. takes place in London before Geoffrey Bache Smith, Robert Gilson, Thomas Kenneth Barnsley and Christopher Wiseman join the Great War.
1925 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1928 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1937 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1938 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1943 - Father Christmas writes his last letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1954 - Singer Annie Lennox is born.
1971 - Attacks of Taste, with a contribution by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
2005 - Reading The Lord of the Rings: New Writings on Tolkien's Classic is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring leaves Rivendell at dusk.
New moon[1]:xlviii

content.title: Other versions of the legendarium
content.content: At first the Fellowship was to depart on 24 November but later Tolkien changed the date.[1]:xlv

content.title: Inspiration
content.content: Tolkien noted in Nomenclature that the date the Fellowship departed from Rivendell was purposefully chosen.
